column2: gamesCaret %>%  mutate(SendOffPred = c(caretPredsTest$No, caretPredsTrain$No), MatchNum=matchNum) -> gamesMatch
gamesMatch %>% group_by(MatchNum) %>% summarise(SendOffPredFull=prod(SendOffPred)) %>% mutate(SendOffRes=sendOffVec) %>% calibration(SendOffRes ~ SendOffPredFull, data=.) -> fullCalib
